code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. WEB-CACHE-SVC.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 HTTP-REQUEST.
          05 CACHE-OPERATION PIC X(20).
          05 CACHE-KEY PIC X(50).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       PROCESS-HTTP-REQUEST.
           ACCEPT HTTP-REQUEST FROM CONSOLE
           PERFORM HANDLE-CACHE-OPERATION
           DISPLAY "HTTP cache response sent".

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. ORDER-CACHE.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 ORDER-ID PIC 9(8).
       01 ORDER-DATA PIC X(100).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           MOVE 12345678 TO ORDER-ID
           MOVE 'ORDER-STATUS-PENDING' TO ORDER-DATA
           CALL 'MEMCACHED-SET' USING ORDER-ID ORDER-DATA
           DISPLAY 'Order cached successfully'
           STOP RUN.

       PROGRAM-ID. SESSION-MANAGER.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01  REDIS-CONNECTION-STRING.
           05  REDIS-HOST       PIC X(15) VALUE 'cache-server'.
           05  REDIS-PORT       PIC 9(5) VALUE 6379.
           05  REDIS-PASSWORD   PIC X(20) VALUE SPACES.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           DISPLAY 'Session manager initialized'.
           STOP RUN.

       DATA DIVISION.

       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       PROCESS-INVOICE-MESSAGE.
           CONNECT TO DATABASE 'BILLING_DB'.

code_snippet:
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 CUSTOMER-ID PIC 9(6).
       01 CUSTOMER-NAME PIC X(30).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       EXEC SQL
           SELECT CUST_NAME
           INTO :CUSTOMER-NAME
           FROM CUSTOMERS
           WHERE CUST_ID = :CUSTOMER-ID
       END-EXEC.
       DISPLAY 'Customer: ' CUSTOMER-NAME.

       PROGRAM-ID. FILE-UTILS.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 FILE-OPERATION-TYPE PIC X(10).
          88 READ-OPERATION VALUE 'READ'.
          88 WRITE-OPERATION VALUE 'write'.
          88 DELETE-OPERATION VALUE 'delete'.
       01 OPERATION-COUNTER PIC 9(5) VALUE ZERO.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. FTP-LISTENER.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 COMMAND-LINE PIC X(80).
       01 FTP-STATUS PIC 9(2).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       WAIT-FOR-FTP-COMMAND.
           ACCEPT COMMAND-LINE FROM FTP-CONSOLE
           EVALUATE COMMAND-LINE(1:4)
               WHEN 'PUT '
                   PERFORM RECEIVE-FILE-UPLOAD
           END-EVALUATE.

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. DATA-SYNC.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 SYNC-RESULT PIC 9(2).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       EXEC SQL
           INSERT INTO TRANSFER_LOG VALUES ('STARTING SFTP SYNC')
       END-EXEC
       CALL 'SFTP-CLIENT' USING 'DOWNLOAD' 'customer-data.xml'
       MOVE RETURN-CODE TO SYNC-RESULT.
       STOP RUN.

       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 GRAPHQL-QUERY PIC X(200) VALUE
          'query { products(category: "electronics") { id name price } }'.
       01 RESPONSE-BUFFER PIC X(1000).

               'https://api.inventory.com/graphql'
               GRAPHQL-QUERY
               RESPONSE-BUFFER.
           DISPLAY 'GraphQL response: ' RESPONSE-BUFFER.
           STOP RUN.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. GRPC-ORDER-SERVICE.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-ORDER-REQUEST PIC X(500).
       01 WS-ORDER-RESPONSE PIC X(500).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       PROCESS-GRPC-ORDER-REQUEST.
           CALL 'GRPC-RECEIVE-ORDER' USING WS-ORDER-REQUEST
           PERFORM VALIDATE-ORDER-DATA
           MOVE 'ORDER-PROCESSED' TO WS-ORDER-RESPONSE
           CALL 'GRPC-SEND-RESPONSE' USING WS-ORDER-RESPONSE.
       STOP RUN.

       01 PROTOBUF-MESSAGE PIC X(500).
       01 ORDER-ID PIC 9(10).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           MOVE 12345 TO ORDER-ID.
           CALL 'SERIALIZE-PROTOBUF' USING ORDER-ID PROTOBUF-MESSAGE.
           CALL 'SEND-ORDER' USING PROTOBUF-MESSAGE.
           STOP RUN.

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. PAYMENT-GATEWAY.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-PAYMENT-REQ PIC X(600).
       01 WS-HTTP-STATUS PIC 9(3).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           MOVE '{"amount":150.00,"currency":"USD"}' TO WS-PAYMENT-REQ

           RETURNING WS-HTTP-STATUS
           IF WS-HTTP-STATUS = 200

WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 RABBIT-HANDLER PIC X(15).
       01 NOTIFICATION-BUFFER PIC X(300).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       LISTEN-NOTIFICATIONS.
           CALL 'RABBIT-START-CONSUMER' USING 'alerts' RABBIT-HANDLER
           PERFORM FOREVER
               CALL 'RABBIT-RECEIVE' USING RABBIT-HANDLER NOTIFICATION-BUFFER
               PERFORM SEND-EMAIL-ALERT
           END-PERFORM.

code_snippet:
<?php
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;

class ApiHandler {
    public function handleUserRequest($userId) {
        $memcached = new Memcached();
        $userData = $memcached->get("user_profile_$userId");
        if (!$userData) {
            $userData = $this->fetchUserFromDb($userId);
            $memcached->set("user_profile_$userId", $userData, 3600);
        }
        return new Response(json_encode($userData));
    }
}

label: DEFINITE_OUTWARD
code_snippet:
<?php
class ProductController {
    public function updateInventory($productId, $quantity) {
        $memcached = new Memcached();
        $memcached->addServer('localhost', 11211);
        $key = 'inventory:' . $productId;
        $result = $memcached->set($key, $quantity, 1800);
        return $result;
    }
}

code_snippet:
<?php
class OrderEndpoint {
    private $datasource;
    
    public function processOrder($orderData) {
        $this->datasource->beginTransaction();
        $orderId = $this->datasource->insert('orders', $orderData);
        $this->datasource->commit();
        return ['order_id' => $orderId];
    }
}

    $deliveryStatus = $request->getParsedBody();

});

$app->post('/api/sftp/webhook', function($request, $response) {
    $payload = json_decode($request->getBody(), true);
    $transferId = $payload['transfer_id'];
    $this->logger->info("SFTP transfer completed: {$transferId}");
    return $response->withJson(['received' => true]);
});

$ftpPass = $_ENV['FTP_PASSWORD'];
$conn = ftp_connect($ftpHost);
if (ftp_login($conn, $ftpUser, $ftpPass)) {
    ftp_chdir($conn, '/uploads');
    $uploadResult = ftp_put($conn, 'report.pdf', $localReportPath, FTP_BINARY);
}

code_snippet:
<?php
class ProductService {
    private $graphqlEndpoint = 'https://api.example.com/graphql';
    
    public function fetchProductDetails($productId) {
        $mutation = 'mutation { updateProduct(id: ' . $productId . ') { id status } }';
        return $this->executeGraphQLRequest($mutation);
    }
    
    private function executeGraphQLRequest($query) {
        return file_get_contents($this->graphqlEndpoint, false, stream_context_create([
            'http' => ['method' => 'POST', 'content' => json_encode(['query' => $query])]
        ]));
    }
}

class InventoryService
{

            $this->updateInventory($request->getProductId());

<?php
use Slim\App;

$app = new App();
// RESTful route for inventory management
$app->post('/inventory/{id}', function ($request, $response, $args) {
    $inventoryId = $args['id'];
    $data = $request->getParsedBody();
    updateInventory($inventoryId, $data);
    return $response->withJson(['success' => true]);
});

<?php
class NotificationService {
    public function sendAlert($message) {
        $apiEndpoint = 'https://notifications.example.com/api/alerts';
        $httpOptions = [
            'method' => 'POST',
            'headers' => ['Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . $this->token],
            'body' => json_encode(['alert' => $message])
        ];
        return wp_remote_post($apiEndpoint, $httpOptions);
    }
}

<?php
class NotificationScheduler {
    public function scheduleReminders() {
        cron_schedule(function() {
            $users = $this->database->query('SELECT * FROM users WHERE reminder_due = 1');
            foreach($users as $user) {
                $this->smsService->sendMessage($user['phone'], 'Reminder: Check your account');
            }
        }, '*/15 * * * *');
    }
}

code_snippet:
<?php
class ShippingCalculator {
    private function callShippingAPI($package) {
        $envelope = '<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">';
        $envelope .= '<soap:Body><calculateRate>' . $package . '</calculateRate></soap:Body>';
        $envelope .= '</soap:Envelope>';
        $context = stream_context_create([
            'http' => ['method' => 'POST', 'content' => $envelope]
        ]);
        return file_get_contents('https://shipping-api.com/rates', false, $context);
    }
}

class NotificationStreamer {
    public function startSSE() {
        // Setup SSE streaming endpoint
        header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
        $this->sendNotifications();
    }
    
    private function sendNotifications() {
        echo "data: {\"type\": \"notification\"}\n\n";
    }
}

code_snippet:
<?php
function sendNotificationViaSSE($userId, $message) {
    $client = new GuzzleHttp\Client();
    $response = $client->post('https://notification-hub.com/sse/send', [
        'headers' => [
            'Content-Type' => 'text/event-stream',
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . getApiToken()
        ],
        'json' => ['user_id' => $userId, 'data' => $message]
    ]);
    return $response->getStatusCode() === 200;
}

import sqlite3

def get_user_profile(user_id):
    database = sqlite3.connect('users.db')
    cursor = database.cursor()
    cursor.execute('SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = ?', (user_id,))
    result = cursor.fetchone()
    database.close()
    return result

code_snippet:
from concurrent import futures
import grpc
import payment_service_pb2_grpc

def serve_payment_api():
    server = grpc.server(futures.ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=5))
    payment_service_pb2_grpc.add_PaymentServiceServicer_to_server(
        PaymentServicer(), server
    )
    listen_addr = '[::]:8080'
    server.add_insecure_port(listen_addr)
    print(f"Starting gRPC payment server on {listen_addr}")
    server.start()
    server.wait_for_termination()

code_snippet:
import inventory_pb2
from google.protobuf import timestamp_pb2

def update_stock_levels(product_id, quantity):
    channel = grpc.secure_channel('inventory.company.com:443', grpc.ssl_channel_credentials())
    stub = inventory_pb2_grpc.InventoryServiceStub(channel)
    
    timestamp = timestamp_pb2.Timestamp()
    timestamp.GetCurrentTime()
    
    request = inventory_pb2.UpdateStockRequest(
        product_id=product_id,
        quantity=quantity,
        timestamp=timestamp
    )
    return stub.UpdateStock(request)

code_snippet:
import boto3
from datetime import datetime

def backup_database():
    s3_client = boto3.client('s3')
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')
    backup_file = f'db_backup_{timestamp}.sql'
    s3_client.upload_file('/tmp/backup.sql', 'company-backups', backup_file)

# Set up cron job to run daily at 3 AM
if __name__ == '__main__':
    backup_database()
signal_line_content: # Set up cron job to run daily at 3 AM

code_snippet:
require 'dalli'
require 'rack'

class CacheHandler
  def call(env)
    request = Rack::Request.new(env)
    memcached = Dalli::Client.new('localhost:11211')
    cached_response = memcached.get(request.path)
    if cached_response
      [200, {'Content-Type' => 'application/json'}, [cached_response]]
    else
      [404, {}, ['Not found in cache']]
    end
  end
end

code_snippet:
class OrderProcessor
  def process_order(order)
    # Store order in cache for quick lookup
    cache_key = "pending_order:#{order.id}"
    $redis.hset(cache_key, order.to_hash)
    $redis.expire(cache_key, 1800)
    
    # Process payment
    payment_result = PaymentGateway.charge(order.total)
    
    if payment_result.success?
      $redis.del(cache_key)
      order.mark_as_paid!
    end
  end
end

require 'pg'

class OrderService
  def process_payment(order_id, amount)
    datasource = PG.connect(dbname: 'payments')
    result = datasource.exec_params(
      'INSERT INTO transactions (order_id, amount) VALUES ($1, $2)',
      [order_id, amount]
    )
    datasource.close
  end
end

module ReportDistribution
  def self.send_monthly_reports
    reports_dir = '/tmp/monthly_reports'
    
    Net::SFTP.start('reports.company.com', 'service_account', password: Rails.application.credentials.sftp_password) do |connection|
      connection.upload!("#{reports_dir}/sales.pdf", '/incoming/sales_report.pdf')
      connection.upload!("#{reports_dir}/inventory.csv", '/incoming/inventory_report.csv')
    end
  end
end

code_snippet:
class NotificationService
  def send_notification(request, _call)
    message = request.message
    recipient = request.recipient_email
    
    NotificationMailer.deliver_now(recipient, message)
    
    response = Google::Protobuf::Empty.new
    response
  rescue StandardError => e
    raise GRPC::Internal.new("Failed to send notification: #{e.message}")
  end
end

class InventoryService
  def update_stock_levels(product_id, quantity)
    soap_client = SOAP::RPC::Driver.new('http://warehouse.company.com/inventory')
    soap_client.add_method('updateStock', 'productId', 'quantity')
    result = soap_client.updateStock(product_id, quantity)
    result.success?
  end
end

require 'sinatra'
require 'json'

get '/events' do
  content_type 'text/event-stream'
  cache_control :no_cache
  
  # Server-sent events implementation
  stream do |out|
    EventBus.subscribe do |event|
      out << "data: #{event.to_json}\n\n"
    end
  end
end

class WebhookProcessor
  include ActionController::Live

  def trigger_external_sse_endpoint
    http = Net::HTTP.new('external-service.com', 443)
    http.use_ssl = true
    request = Net::HTTP::Post.new('/api/sse/trigger')
    request.body = { event: 'data_update', timestamp: Time.now }.to_json
    http.request(request)
  end
end

class StreamingConfig
  # Server-sent events endpoint configuration
